verblex: 1. To be attractive, pleasant and pleasing to the eye and other senses. English = (be) beautiful, (be) lovely, (be) pretty.
2. To make something attractive, pleasant and pleasing to the eye and other senses. English = beautify.
nomlex: 1. The quality of being attractive, pleasant and pleasing to the eye and other senses.  English = beauty, loveliness, prettiness.
2. (When speaking of people) the quality of attractiveness found in women. English = beauty, loveliness, prettiness.
